1.「これは これは……。| あなたは かなりの剛の者と 見受けました。| そこを見:
Well, well, well... You seem to be a man of|great strength... That's why you're here to|talk to me. My name is Gabra, and I'm a|
|hexenbiest trainer... I'm a hexenbiest|trainer named Gabra... and I run a training|facility in a certain part of the world...|
|where I raise monsters called pygmy beasts.|There is a dangerous creature that escaped|from the training grounds due to our|

|get a core of pyrotechnics that you can use|to strengthen your equipment... For more|information on the Nucleus, please ask the|
|nearby pyromancer Levy... He can also restore|shards and fragments... Now, in order to find|the pyroxene, I have something for you...|
|Please, accept...

2.「さて……この魔獣調教士ガブラめに| 本日は どのような ご用件でございますか？: Well... What can I do for you today, Gabula|the Hexenbiest?<break>

3.「他に 何か ご用件は ありますか？|<break>: Is there anything else I can do for you?<break>

5.「さて……。この魔獣調教士ガブラめに| 本日は どのような ご用件でございますか: Well... What can I do for you today, Gabula|the Hexenbiest?<break>

If you're going to cultivate <%sM_MONSTER>,|you'll need <%nM_ITEM_NUM> magical cells...|They'll be consumed regardless of victory or|
|defeat, is that correct?

7.「……おや？| 魔因細胞が 足りないようです。| お時間のあるときに 集めてみら: ... Hmm? We're running low on magical|cells... Why don't you try to collect them|when you have time?<end>

8.「申し訳ありませんが あなたは| パーティのリーダーでは ございませんね。| リ: I'm sorry, sir, but you are not the leader of|this party. You've only been here since you|became the leader...<end>

9.「この秘術をかければ 今から ３０分の間| 魔界の魔物を倒したときに 魔因細胞を:
If you cast this spell, from now on for the|next 30 minutes, when you kill a demon in the|demon world, it will rarely drop a demon|
|cell... You can only cast this spell once a|day... If any other spell is cast, it will be|erased, so... This spell will not work on|
|your party mates, only on you. Please don't|forget... Are you sure you don't mind if I|cast this special spell on you?

10.「では まいります……。| ガ～ブラン ダ～ブラン セルルーチョっ！|<br>|:
Here we go... Ga-bran, da-bran, serluccio!|... The spell will now take effect... The|effects of the spell will wear off in 30|
|minutes, so please hurry...

My name is Gavra, and I'm a hexenbiest|trainer. I'm a hexenbiest trainer named|Gabra... and I run a training facility in a|

|When you defeat a pygmy beast, you get a core|of pyrotechnics that you can use to|strengthen your equipment... For more|
